body_html:
Not exactly. I'm saying if one wants to penalize the norm of the Jacobian of the mapping function.
So optimization objective would be (pseudocode):

cost(y,yhat, X) = loss(y,yhat) + norm(Jacobian(log(yhat), X))

body:
Not exactly. I'm saying if one wants to penalize the norm of the Jacobian of the mapping function. 
So optimization objective would be (pseudocode):

cost(y,yhat, X) = loss(y,yhat) + norm(Jacobian(log(yhat), X))
